sentence.Network_en: Sika deer ( cervus nippon ), subordinated toartiodactyla, cervidae , muntiacus, is a kind of ruminated mammal.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅花鹿 ( Cervusnippon ) 隶属偶蹄目 、 鹿科 、 鹿属, 是反刍哺乳动物.

sentence.Network_en: The progress of the study on evolution and conservation genetics of Cervidae was reviewed.
sentence.Network_cn: 综述了近年来鹿科动物的进化和保护遗传学研究进展.
